name: World Soccer Jikkyou Winning Eleven 2000: U-23 Medal e no Chousen
summary: All have evolved, of this century last "World Soccer Jikkyou Winning Eleven" appeared! Operability and movement of players power up! In addition to A representative, U-23 team also included! It is equipped with the very popular that further enriched and "Master league" and "Olympic mode". Derive to the Olympic gold medal the Japan U-23 representative in the hands of you!
